page.title: 10INDUSTRY C. CROOKHAM
page.content: { Redfields Industrial Estate. In Church Crookham there are two industrial estates.On the new one two firms have opened,one called R,J,L Engineering and the other is a freezer firm.R,J,L make parts for aeroplanes. Other sites will open soon.{Potter's. Mr. G.W.Potter owns a coalyard and an industrial estate in Church Crookham off Aldershot Road.His father bought it 63 years ago in 1922.he paid Â£73.00 for 5acres of heathland. First it was a farm then the coalyard was add in 1942.Coal became less popular so a haulage service was begun. In the last 5 years 12 light industry units have been added such as roofing experts and vechicle repairers. {Northfield {Parade} lies at the back of the yard. There are 6 shops and flats.Tilers, Newsagents,Launderette,Hairdressers Second_hand shop and Double Glazing.
